name: TEETH (Brainape Games)
description:
MADE FOR THE 64x64 2022 GAME JAM

I don't like this game, I'm only uploading it here because its proof that I tried.

Hoping to make better games in the future, this is quite disappointing.

BEFORE YOU PLAYYYYYYY(READ THIS)

Collect 6 souls to escape! 

But beware, there is a monster roaming!

When the screen shakes, move out of the way of the monster and stay still!(the monster stays in the middle of the path)

When the screen stops shaking, the monster isn't aware of you any more!(you can move)

CONTROLS:

Wasd - Move around

Collect souls by walking over them.
